title: What is your most favorable collectible item? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is one of my classic horror film babies. I only didn't feature it on my list of some of my favourites, because I think it deserves a special mention of its own.   This is one of only four thousand special-edition steel books of the 1965 film, Dr Terror's House of Horrors. It was Amicus’ first portmanteau and I genuinely can't decide if I love it more or less than The House That Dripped Blood, which was featured in the aforementioned post.
Ancient variety of coins from accross the world.
